metadata.dc:author: Sánchez, María José Rodríguez
metadata.dc:description: This article finalizes a series on Operating Guides for Emergencies in which, from her personal viewpoint, the author explains various "tricks" and skills to use when facing diverse emergency situations. In this article, the author describes some tricks to apply when a patient simulates an injury/illness or other situations in which nurses may find themselves immersed.
metadata.dc:title: Paciente que simula. Y otras habilidades y trucos.
[A patient who simulates an injury. Illness and other skills and tricks].
